Garment Technologist – Jersey

Job Context

Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) is a multinational apparel buying hub and exporter. The organization is marching ahead with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions and value-added services to end products for the textile industries. DSL is committed to achieve global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. Global headquarter of Dongyi sourcing is located at North Point, Hong Kong and Global corporate office is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dongyi Sourcing Ltd is searching potential candidates for Garment Technologist – Jersey position.

 

Job Responsibilities

  • Ensure that factory has full understanding of the DSL development process

  • Need to work with Development Merchandiser and Factories to ensure a detailed and accurate sample pack is given out on First time

  • Clear instructions regarding stitching and finishing

  • Correct block reference and accurate size specification

  • Assist factories at every stage of development / fit process to ensure a smooth approval process

  • Ensure there is no conflicting information regarding development

  • Accurately measure and log measurements before sending sample to customers

  • Ensure that critical path is updated and be responsible for liaising with merchandisers to chase factories for samples to be in DSL office in plenty of time to check thoroughly against customers comments before being submitted to customer for fit approval.

  • Clear comments / suggestions are made in workbook/email for technologist to refer to when fitting sample

  • Working with technologist (customer) to ensure the most effective route for approval.

  • Ensure all points (Technologist comments) are clearly explained to our factories

  • Maintain sample progress sheets and update in system

  • Monitor success of each supplier in connection to sample accuracy and meeting set dates regarding critical path

  • Generate and maintain be accountable for workbook consolidation and maintenance from white seal / first fit sample request through to gold seal

  • Be responsible for constructive work book comments, ensuring autonomy at all times

Employment Status

  • Full-time

Requirements

  • Graduation from any reputed university on Textile subject.

  • Strong knowledge on garment technical systems, regulations, and industry standards.

  • 8-10 years working experience from both factory & any reputed buying house.

  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail.

  • Demonstrated leadership and team management abilities.

  • Effective communication and presentation skills.

  • English written & spoken are mandatory.

Additional Requirements

  • Age limit 35 years.

  • Fluent in English both written & email communication

  • Proven experience as a garment technologist or relevant role

  • Thorough knowledge of methodologies of garment technologist and standards

  • Excellent numerical skills and understanding of data analysis/statistical methods

  • Excellent organizational and leadership abilities

  • Reliable and Trustworthy

Job Location

  • Dhaka (Uttara)

Salary

  • Negotiable

Compensation & Other Benefits

  • Mobile bill

  • Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize

  • Salary Review: Yearly

  • Festival Bonus: 2

  • Performance bonus

  • On-time salary – Current month’s salary is paid in current monthly only (last working day of each month)

  • Health Insurance

  • Medical Insurance

  • Long-term benefits

  • PF

If you are passionate to good fit for the position please send your updated CV to

career@dongyi.hk

by 14th July 2024

Note: Please Mention the Position Name in Email Subject.
